channel.title: 3 | Nunez Lab for Computational Mental Health & Cancer Care

item.title: A Chatbot for the Management of Bipolar Disorder: Using Retrieval-Augmented Generation with an Open-Weight Large Language Model to Answer Clinical Questions Based on the CANMAT and ISBD 2018 Guidelines
item.description:
Click the Cite button above to demo the feature to enable visitors to import publication metadata into their reference management software.
Create your slides in Markdown - click the Slides button to check out the example.

Supplementary notes can be added here, including code, math, and images.
